thread.title: Connor McDavid scores as Oilers beat Red Wings
thread.title_full: Connor McDavid scores as Oilers beat Red Wings

author: Shane Jones
title: Connor McDavid scores as Oilers beat Red Wings
text: Hockey Edmonton Oilers' Eric Gryba (62), Andrew Ference (21), Connor McDavid (97), Nail Yakupov (10) and Benoit Pouliot (67) celebrate a goal by McDavid against the Detroit Red Wings during second period NHL action in Edmonton, Alta., on Wednesday October 21, 2015. (JASON FRANSON/THE CANADIAN PRESS) Edmonton Oilers' Eric Gryba (62), Andrew Ference (21), Connor McDavid (97), Nail Yakupov (10) and Benoit Pouliot (67) celebrate a goal by McDavid against the Detroit Red Wings during second period NHL action in Edmonton, Alta., on Wednesday October 21, 2015.(JASON FRANSON/THE CANADIAN PRESS) Connor McDavid scores as Oilers beat Red Wings Add to ... Shane Jones
